message: Let's start with a fair split and see if we can do better

I'm taking a risk, but I think we can both do better if we split it 60/40 in my favor. I'm hoping you'll see that it's in your best interest to accept this offer since the money will be worth less in the next round.
I'm not willing to accept a 60/40 split. I'll make a counter-offer: 55/45 in my favor
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I'm taking a risk by giving you more. I'm hoping you'll accept this offer before the next round of inflation hits
